import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Axios from 'axios'; import './books.css'; function Books() { const [searchKey, setSearchKey] = useState(""); const searchBook = (e) => { if(e.key === "Enter"){ } } return (
setSearchKey(e.target.value)} onKeyPress={searchBook}/>
